segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps running, unchecked, onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste, and it's making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman isn't paying any attention to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her carelessness is really quite infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, they know they shouldn't be climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're actively sneaking them right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could easily fall and break something, or even himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer audacity of their secret mission is astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a picture of impending pandemonium.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to turn off that faucet and stop the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet floor and the unstable stool are a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a messy and irresponsible scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to take charge here!
segments.speaker: PAR
